contest-event.event-date:
April 30, 1995 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Hymn tune contest - Hinchliffe Mill. Best euphonium - Diane Liversedge (Slaithwaite) 69th annual contest. 8 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 8:32 a.m. June 29, 2016, 9:20 a.m.
1 Marsden Silver Prize Band Alan Widdop
2 Hinchliffe Mill Band I. Tiffany
3 Emley Brass Band Clive Jowett
4 Linthwaite Silver Band David Pogson
Unknown Result Honley Silver Band Bessie Ackroyd
Unknown Result Uppermill Band Jim Hunter
Unknown Result Friezland Band G. Dodge
Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Harold Robinson
